content: राष्ट्रं [राज्-ष्ट्रन्] {@--1@} A kingdom, realm, empire; राष्ट्रदुर्गबलानि च <ls>Ak.</ls>, <ls>Ms. 7. 109</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">10. 61.</ls> {@--2@} A district, territory, country, region; as in महाराष्ट्र; <ls>Ms. 7. 32.</ls> {@--3@} The people, nation, subjects; <ls>Ms. 9. 254.</ls> --ष्ट्रः , --ष्ट्रं Any national or public calamity.
